cause.description:
Dating violence is controlling, abusive, and aggressive behavior in a romantic relationship. It can include verbal, emotional, physical, or sexual abuse, or a combination of them. Dating violence affects one in four teens, and can happen to men and women in both heterosexual and homosexual relationships.
To learn more about preventing dating violence, visit www.ncpc.org.
1. Dating violence is unacceptable.
2. Dating violence can be prevented by promoting healthy relationships, self-esteem, and positive ways to manage conflict.
cause.mission: To prevent threats, intimidation, and violence between individuals who are in a relationship
cause.name: Prevent Dating Violence
